title: CEO Profile
name: Hojin Lee
intro: Providing innovative solutions based on over 10 years of software development experience and AI expertise.

about.title: About
about.description: Graduated from Seoul National University with a degree in Computer Engineering and worked on various projects at major companies like Naver and Kakao. Currently focusing on AI and machine learning expertise, helping companies with digital transformation.
